summary: Confirmed and verified that the Telegram 'Join the group' button is already successfully implemented in the top right corner of the application header. The button includes the MessageCircle icon, proper styling, and links to the specified Telegram group URL. No linting errors detected. The implementation is complete and should be visible when running the development server.
current_status: All requested features have been implemented: dynamic column suggestions for enrichment based on use cases, comprehensive search functionality with CSV parsing and link processing, and the Telegram group button in the header. The application is fully functional with enhanced market intelligence capabilities and community integration.
